TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripLabel extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem

summary.span: 表示不可选的 ，它呈现文本和图像并且可以显示超链接。

span.span: Represents a nonselectable that renders text and images and can display hyperlinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类创建一个标签，该标签可以呈现可实现 和 属性的文本和图像。Use the class to create a label that can render text and images that can implement the and properties. 还具有许多属性，使其能够显示一个或多个超链接，以及修改超链接的外观和行为的其他属性。The also has many properties that enable it to display one or more hyperlinks, and other properties that modify the appearance and behavior of hyperlinks. 类似于默认情况下不会获得焦点且不会呈现为按下或突出显示的 。The is like a that does not get focus by default and that does not render as pushed or highlighted. 作为托管项支持访问密钥。 as a hosted item supports access keys. 使用 上 、和 属性，以支持 中的链接控件。Use the , , and properties on a to support link control in a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过设置 、、、、 和 属性，初始化 以包含链接。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color ActiveLinkColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };
member this.ActiveLinkColor : System.Drawing.Color with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用来显示活动链接的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used to display an active link.

value.span: ，表示用来显示活动链接的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color to display an active link.
The default color is specified by the system.
Typically, this color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 活动链接是正在被单击的链接。An active link is a link that is in the process of being clicked. 这类似于按下 控件的状态。This is similar to the depressed state of a control. 使用此属性可以指定在链接处于单击过程中时显示链接的颜色。You can use this property to specify the color that the link is displayed in when the link is in the process of being clicked. 有许多与链接相关联的颜色。There are a number of colors associated with a link. 指定 控件中显示的所有链接的颜色。The specifies the color of all links displayed in the control. 利用 属性，您可以指定链接被用户访问后的链接的颜色。The property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性时，请确保将属性设置为的颜色不会与控件的背景颜色冲突，否则文本将不会正确显示。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 例如，如果控件的背景色是 `Color.Red` 的，并且此属性设置为 `Color.Red`，则在单击该链接时，文本将不会正确显示。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is in the process of being clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过设置 、、、、 和 属性，初始化 以包含链接。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值表示链接的行为。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the behavior of a link.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您可以在链接显示在控件中时指定链接的行为。This property enables you to specify the behavior of links when they are displayed in the control. 例如，如果希望仅当鼠标指针位于某一链接上时才显示带下划线的链接，则可以将此属性设置为 `LinkBehavior.HoverUnderline`。For example, if you want links to be displayed with an underline only when the mouse pointer is over a link, you can set this property to `LinkBehavior.HoverUnderline`. 有关可与链接关联的行为类型的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about the types of behaviors that can be associated with a link, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过设置 、、、、 和 属性，初始化 以包含链接。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示链接是否应显示为如同被访问过的链接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a link should be displayed as though it were visited.

value.span: 如果链接应显示为如同被访问过，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if links should display as though they were visited; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件不会自动表示链接是已访问的链接。A control does not automatically denote that a link is a visited link. 若要将链接显示为已访问链接，可以将此属性的值设置为 的 click 事件的事件处理程序中的 `true`。To display the link as a visited link, you can set the value of this property to `true` in an event handler for the click event of the . 使用 控件的 属性中指定的颜色显示已访问的链接。A visited link is displayed using the color specified in the property of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过设置 、、、、 和 属性，初始化 以包含链接。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override bool ProcessMnemonic (char charCode);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance bool ProcessMnemonic(char charCode) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Function ProcessMnemonic (charCode As Char) As Boolean
protected public: override bool ProcessMnemonic(char charCode);

span.span: The character to process.

summary.span: 处理助记符。

span.span: Processes a mnemonic character.

returns.span: 如果字符由控件作为助记键处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法可使项有机会处理助记键字符。This method is called to give an item the opportunity to process a mnemonic character. 方法应确定项是否处于用于处理助记键的状态，以及给定字符是否表示助记键。The method should determine whether the item is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic. 如果是这样，则该方法应执行与助记键关联的操作，并返回 `true`。If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`. 如果不是，则该方法应返回 `false`。If not, the method should return `false`. 实现依赖于宿主 控件来调用 方法，以确定给定字符是否与项文本中的助记键匹配。The implementation relies on the host control to call the method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the item's text. 在这种情况下，方法将选择与标签关联的项，如果不能选择项，则会引发 事件。In this case, the method selects the item associated with the label, or raises the event if the item cannot be selected.

summary.span: 获取或设置当显示以前访问过的链接时所使用的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used when displaying a link that has been previously visited.

value.span: ，它表示用来显示已访问过的链接的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color used to display links that have been visited.
The default color is specified by the system.
Typically, this color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于指定为用户访问的 中的所有链接显示的颜色。This property enables you to specify the color that is displayed for all links in the that have been visited by the user. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性时，请确保将属性设置为的颜色不会与控件的背景颜色冲突，否则文本将不会正确显示。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 例如，如果控件的背景色是 `Color.Red` 的，并且此属性设置为 `Color.Red`，则当链接显示为已访问链接时，文本将不会正确显示。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is displayed as a visited link. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何通过设置 、、、、 和 属性，初始化 以包含链接。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/VB/form1.vb#1)]
